title: Earth's Rotation Has Tilted 31.5 Inches And Humans Are To Blame
content: Earth's tilt, or axial precession, is influenced by the distribution of mass (in this case water) across the planet.
summary: Earth's tilt, or axial precession, is influenced by the distribution of mass (in this case water) across the planet.

title: 1 Killed, House Catches Fire As Cargo Plane Crashes In Lithuania
content: A DHL cargo plane flying from Germany to Lithuania crashed early Monday near the airport of the capital Vilnius killing one person.
summary: A DHL cargo plane flying from Germany to Lithuania crashed early Monday near the airport of the capital Vilnius killing one person.

title: Will Parent-Killing Menendez Brothers Be Freed? Court Hearing From Today
content: Lyle and Erik Menendez are set to face a judge Monday as the campaign to free them from their life sentences for the shotgun murders of their parents gathers pace.

title: In Bangladesh Camps, Rohingya Refugees Mobilise To Fight In Myanmar
content: One day in July, Rafiq slipped out of the world's largest refugee settlement in southern Bangladesh and crossed the border into Myanmar on a small boat. His destination: a ruinous civil war in a nation that he had fled in 2017.
summary: One day in July, Rafiq slipped out of the world's largest refugee settlement in southern Bangladesh and crossed the border into Myanmar on a small boat. His destination: a ruinous civil war in a nation that he had fled in 2017.

title: Scott Bessent, Trump's US Treasury Pick, Fuels Global Relief Rally Vs Dollar
content: The selection of Scott Bessent as the next Treasury Secretary has fueled a rally in currencies around the world against the dollar, as traders trim bets that the return of Donald Trump will send tremors throughout global markets.
summary: The selection of Scott Bessent as the next Treasury Secretary has fueled a rally in currencies around the world against the dollar, as traders trim bets that the return of Donald Trump will send tremors throughout global markets.

title: Uruguay's Left Returns To Presidency As Yamandu Orsi Wins Election
content: Center-leftopposition candidate Yamandu Orsi secured victory inUruguay'spresidential election, official results showed on Sunday, with 99 per cent of votes tallied, in a second-round race that pollsters expected to be closely fought.
summary: Center-leftopposition candidate Yamandu Orsi secured victory inUruguay'spresidential election, official results showed on Sunday, with 99 per cent of votes tallied, in a second-round race that pollsters expected to be closely fought.

title: Far-Right Pro-Russian Populist Takes Surprise Lead In Romania Elections
content: Far-right candidate Calin Georgescu surged unexpectedly in Romania's presidential election, pulling ahead of the pro-European prime minister with more than 98 percent of votes counted Monday and looking all but certain to advance to a runoff.
summary: Far-right candidate Calin Georgescu surged unexpectedly in Romania's presidential election, pulling ahead of the pro-European prime minister with more than 98 percent of votes counted Monday and looking all but certain to advance to a runoff.

title: Video: Hezbollah Fires 250 Rockets Into Israeli After Strike on Beirut
content: Israel struck Hezbollah's south Beirut stronghold, as Lebanese media reported intense fighting in the border area. In response, Iran-backed Hezbollah fired about 250 rockets and other projectiles into Israel.

title: Who Is Yamandu Orsi, Uruguay's Newly-Elected 'Modern Left' President

title: Tulsi Gabbard, Trump's Intelligence Pick, Set To Face Tough Questions

title: Why Trump's $100,000 Swiss-Made Watches Are Not Selling Much

title: Russian Plane Engine Catches Fire In Turkey, All 95 Passengers Evacuated
content: The engine of a Russian-made passenger plane caught fire after landing at southern Turkey's Antalya Airport on Sunday, the Turkish transport ministry said.
